channel.title: Setup on Kraken Brewing
channel.description: Recent content in Setup on Kraken Brewing

item.title: New Setup
item.author: luketryan95@gmail.com (Luke Ryan)
item.description: Last week, I purchased the Brewzilla 3.1 35L all-in-one brewing system along with a few bits and pieces. I also bought a huge fermentation fridge that should let me control temperature a lot better. My next brewday (Mango IPA) will be the first using this new system after only using BIAB in the past.
